''Function''
__NOTOC__
=== Declaration ===
<tt>#include <pgm/pgm.h></tt>

<tt>int '''pgm_async_get_fd''' (</tt><br>
: <tt>[[OpenPGM C Reference/pgm_async_t|pgm_async_t]]**     async</tt><br>
: <tt>);</tt>

=== Purpose ===
Retrieve file descriptor for event signalling.

=== Parameters ===

<table border="1" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<th>Parameter</th>
<th>Description</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><tt>async</tt></td>
<td>Asynchronous receiver object.</td>
</table>


=== Return Value ===
On success the file descriptor is returned.  If <tt>async</tt> is invalid, <tt>-EINVAL</tt> is returned.

=== Example ===

 int fd = pgm_async_get_fd (async);
